chapter.title: Getting in Touch with dCache
chapter.para: This section is a guide for exploring a newly installed system. The confidence obtained by this exploration will prove very helpful when encountering problems in the running system. This forms the basis for the more detailed stuff in the later parts of this book.
The starting point is a fresh installation according to the installation instructions shipped with your distribution of .
